name: DCCBridge
short_description:
Looking for a cheap way to control a model-railroad? .. here it is .. buy Arduino-Board and a Ardumoto-Shield .. well you are already finished ... nearly .. you need Firmware for your Arduino and Software for your Windows.

Okay .. what is DCC-Bridge:
 Arduino-Based-DCC-Signal-Generation (Firmware)
 C#-Windows-Based LENZ-LAN Emulation Layer

So .. you upload the DCCBridge-Code to your Arduino .. start DCCBridge.exe .. and connect with your favorite Railroad-Software like RocRail ...
summary: C# and Arduino based DCCBridge for Model-Railroads
